selected_quotes: It's been a long time since I last shared... Great (short) int'l consensus article on MRI safety responsibilities
International Consensus Document affirming #MRIsafety MRMD / MRSO / MRSE roles responsibilities. Full Text -
Recommended responsibilities for management of MR safety - Intersociety MR Safety Working Group - JMRI -
We should not underestimate the importance of the #MRISafety Expert #MRSE - expert means expert

facebook.summary:
ABMRS contributed to this paper on the formal definition of MR safety roles and responsibilities has been released in JMRI ahead of print. The paper crystalizes an international consensus around the roles we certify, MRMD, MRSO, and MRSE.

http://onlinelib
